description.raw:
Backport of PR 3141 \(courtesy of @{557058:e1c3e6a0-9a64-4e5f-a668-feebc191c5b6} \)

Gazebo9 on VS2019 is failing due to this problem:

[https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/vs2019/job/\_test\_msvc19\_gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64/3/consoleFull#-6177953588ff58640-3599-4406-a210-216932f1748c](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/vs2019/job/_test_msvc19_gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64/3/consoleFull#-6177953588ff58640-3599-4406-a210-216932f1748c)

Fixed with this branch:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=_test_msvc19_gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64&build=4)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/vs2019/job/\_test\_msvc19\_gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64/4/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/vs2019/job/_test_msvc19_gazebo-ci-gazebo9-windows7-amd64/4/))

‌

‌
